name: Web3WomenInScience
description: The mission of Web3 Women in Science (W3WS) is to address the critical underrepresentation of women and nonbinary individuals at the intersection of science and web3, sometimes referred to as “DeSci” for Decentralized Science. To our knowledge, W3WS is the only existing advocacy group specifically devoted to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) in the DeSci space
